Method Detail

rulePosFunction

LogicStatement rulePosFunction(LogicStatement ln,
                               Parser p)
This applies the logic rule one way. For instance if we have the double negation rule, this might go from A to (not (not A))

Parameters:
ln -
p -
Returns:
Transformed logic statement

ruleNegFunction

LogicStatement ruleNegFunction(LogicStatement ln,
                               Parser p)
The applies the logic rule the opposite way ie. (not (not A)) to A

Returns:
